page.title: 16Child Opinions of Our Town
page.content:
We did a survey to ask our class about Cinderford and the surrounding areas. Here are some of the answers. Most people disliked the sheep roaming around because they eat all the plants and flowers. We were glad that Double View Secondary School was changing to Heywood Comprehensive. If we could make any changes we would alter the shops and build a supermarket. Most of us wrote that we need a cinema for entertainment. We thought that the forest people were nice and friendly. We thought that in future Cinderford will grow as large as Gloucester.
by Joanna Gabb.
